collectible.title: Video Camera
collectible.subtitle: A portable handheld video camera. Also takes pictures.
collectible.text: "Didn't Jura look absolutely stunning? There are whole drives full of my sexy glamor shots! I wish Barnette didn't have to do it all herself..."

collectible.title: Pilot ID
collectible.subtitle: For scanning delivery orders through the Regisystem.
collectible.text:
ジュラ・ベーシル・エルデン
Jura Basil Elden
Rank: Pilot
Age: 20
Blood Type: AB
Birthday: August 31st
Height: 174 cm
Weight: 53 kg
B-W-H: 93-60-91 cm
Voice: Yuu Asakawa

Pilots a special scarlet Dread fighter, as well as the crab-like "Red Claw" Vandread mech, known for its shielding capabilities. As her Dread has been modified, it no longer fits in the platforms for standard orders. Already a senior pilot when Barnette joined and started working in Reg, and first met her when she resisted her order.
collectible.unlock: Guide Jura's table through some Growing Pains.

collectible.title: Photo Finish
collectible.subtitle: Elegance transcends space and time.
collectible.text: "Come on, take another one! Jura can keep going for hours..."
collectible.unlock: Jura will never refuse a second angle.

collectible.title: Jura's Kisses
collectible.subtitle: The greatest gift Jura can give, according to Jura.
collectible.text:
"Mmmmwah!"

You feel her lipstick smear and her breasts squish. She's wrapped her naked body around you. You think that's it, but she goes in for a dozen more.

"Mwah! Mwah! Mwah! I'm thanking you properly. You taught Jura so much! I'll---mwahmnn---have to come back one day..."
collectible.unlock: Make Jura lose as a male.

collectible.title: CZ 75
collectible.subtitle: "We're not going to Moscow. It's Czechoslovakia! It's like going into Wisconsin."
collectible.text:
Type: Semiautomatic
Manufacturer: ČZUB
Designed: 1975
Cartridge: 9x19 mm Parabellum
Walnut Grip
Original "Short-Rail" Model

Of the many 20th-century antiques in Barnette's collection, the CZ 75 handgun is her favorite, and her sidearm of choice. Also among its fans is Chicago gunshop owner Irene "Rally" Vincent of Gunsmith Cats, another character voiced by Michiko Neya. No surprise: Takeshi Mori directed both series.
collectible.unlock: Make Jura lose as a female.
